summary: This is an email from an FBI Special Agent in the New York Field Office, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force, dated September 28, 2021. It indicates that three attached items have been serialized since September 22, 2021, following an export of the case file. The document serves as a procedural update regarding the addition of new serials to the Epstein investigation case file.

persons.name: Special Agent- FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Des
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified as a Special Agent from the FBI's New York Field Office, Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force, providing an update on case file serialization.

events.title: Case File Export and Serialization
events.description: The case file was exported, and three attached items began the serialization process.
personsInvolved: Special Agent- FBI New York Field Office Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Des

keyFacts: The document is an email dated September 28, 2021, from an FBI Special Agent in the New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force.
It states that three attached items have been serialized since September 22, 2021, following an export of the case file.
The communication is a procedural update regarding the management of the Epstein investigation case file, indicating ongoing administrative activity.
